data.title: Evansville Indiana
data.text:
AJ Alexander, a native to Evansville, was the Playmate of the Month for the May 2008 issue of Playboy magazine.

Graduate of the University of Evansville Matt Williams is a TV producer best known for his work on The Cosby Show, Home Improvement, and Roseanne.

A native to Evansville, cartoonist David Horsey has drawn for the Los Angeles Times since 2011 and won the Pulitzer Prize for Editorial Cartooning twice.

Country and rock music singer, Jace Everett, was born in Evansville. He co-wrote Josh Turner's No. 1 single "Your Man."

Actress, Jama Williamson, was born in Evansville, IN. She is best known for playing Principal Mullins in the Nickelodeon series, School of Rock. She has also made appearances in the TV series Parks and Recreation as well as The Good Place.

Avery Brooks, actor and Evansville native, is best know for his roles as Benjamin Sisko on Star Trek: Deep Space Nine and Hawk on Spenser: For Hire.

Raised in Evansville, Budd Boetticher was most famous for the Universal Pictures series of Western movies he made in the late 1950s.

Rami Malek, a 2003 graduate of the University of Evansville, won a 2018 Golden Globe for his portrayal of Freddie Mercury in Bohemian Rhapsody.

Scenes from the 1992 hit movie 'A League of Their Own' were shot at historic Bosse Field. The movie starred Tom Hanks, Geena Davis, Madonna, Rosie O'Donnell, and Lori Petty.

Victoria National Golf Club was ranked #83 out of 200 international golf courses. It's also ranked #43 on the list of America's top 100 courses.

Actor Dylan Minnette is known for his roles in Netflix's 13 Reasons Why, plus Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day and Goosebumps.

UE alum Rami Malek won a Critics' Choice Award and Primetime Emmy Award for his lead role as Elliot Alderson in the USA Network television series Mr. Robot.

Birthplace of Louise Dresser, who was nominated for Best Actress during the first presentations of the Academy Awards in 1929.

Bosse High School grad Michael Michele is best known for her roles in TV drama ER and the film How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days.
